title.native: フューチャーカード バディファイトDDD

description: Gao Mikado, a 6th year student of the Aibo Academy Elementary Division, is partnered with Dragon of the Sun, Bal Dragon, a monster born from a mysterious egg. To earn the coveted title as the strongest fighter in the world, Gao and Bal team up to challenge other fighters in the "World Buddy Cup". The two will have to battle others in a card game called Buddyfight, which allows monsters to fight alongside humans as buddies. Their rivals include ex-Buddy Police Tasuku Ryuenji, and the self-proclaimed strongest combination, Gaito Kurouzu and his buddy monster Black Death Dragon, Abygale.

tags.name: Card Battle
tags.description: Centers around individuals competing in card games.

tags.name: Reincarnation
tags.description: Features a character being born again after death, typically as another person or in another world.

tags.name: Dragons
tags.description: Prominently features mythical reptiles which generally have wings and can breathe fire.

tags.name: CGI
tags.description: Prominently features scenes created with computer-generated imagery.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Primarily Child Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters below a high school age.

tags.name: Amnesia
tags.description: Prominently features a character(s) with memory loss.

tags.name: Alternate Universe
tags.description: Features multiple alternate universes in the same series.

フューチャーカード バディファイト (2017)

name.native: ジャックナイフ・ドラゴン
太陽の竜 バルドラゴン
alternative: Dragon of the Sun‚ Bal Dragon

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/mitsupage3)

Once worked as an assistant for [Youhei Sakai](https://anilist.co/staff/104537/Youhei-Sakai) and [Yuki Miyoshi](https://anilist.co/staff/99267/Yuki-Miyoshi).

He is married to his fellow mangaka and former assistant [Chiyo Kenmotsu](https://anilist.co/staff/107949).

__Height:__ 159 cm

[Website (Avex)](https://avex.jp/tokuisora/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/tokui_sorangley) | [LINE Blog](https://lineblog.me/tokuisora/) | [Blog (old)](https://ameblo.jp/tokui-sora/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJ8Wj4izZCt1i9gdTXnbD_Q) | [Bilibili](https://space.bilibili.com/524622683) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sora_Tokui) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E5%BE%B3%E4%BA%95%E9%9D%92%E7%A9%BA)

**Non-Anime Roles**:
- Blanc - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- Hook - Honkai: Star Rail (VG)

[Official Website](https://bushiroad.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kidanit)

Takaaki Kidani is a Japanese businessman. He is the founder and president of Bushiroad. Kidani has also served as the chairman of New Japan Pro-Wrestling (NJPW). He continues to be involved with NJPW through Bushiroad, in which owns the company.

He founded Bushiroad in May 2007 as a company that produces card games and assumed the position of president. The origin of the name Bushiroad comes from the failure to make Neppu Kairiku Bushi Road into a film due to various reasons when he led the project in the days of Broccoli. The film was restarted in March 2013 with Kidani as the executive producer. The company would create numerous media franchises including Tantei Opera Milky Holmes and BanG Dream!

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/kawasak54965532)

Hiroyuki Kawasaki is a screenwriter and novelist.

__[Official Website](http://www.shouta-aoi.jp/) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/noboru0811) | [Personal Twitter](https://twitter.com/shouta0811aoi) | [Professional Twitter](https://twitter.com/AOISHOUTAstaff) | [Youtube Channel](https://www.youtube.com/c/aoishoutaKING)__

Singer and voice actor since February 2011. Used to have a complex about his feminine voice, but he got over it because people liked that type of unique voice.

Ryuunosuke Matsushita in _Kimi to Boku_ was his first anime role. He also sings many insert songs in the same anime. Ai Mikaze from _UtaPri_ series is the role that made him popular. Debuted with the mini-album "Blue Bird" on June 26, 2013.

Bushiroad Inc. (株式会社ブシロード, Kabushiki-gaisha Bushirōdo) is a Japanese entertainment company producer of collectible card games and trading cards, publisher of mobile apps and games, promotional items and many other venues, which was founded in 2007 by Takaaki Kidani and is headquartered in Tokyo.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/bushi_PR)

[Website](https://hibiki-cast.jp/hibiki_f/aiba/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/aibaaiai) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/aiba_aiai/)

A voice actor and the lead singer of the band [Roselia](https://anilist.co/staff/153170/Roselia). Before becoming a seiyuu, she was a professional wrestler under the name "Yuuki Harima" for about 2 years, and also worked as a stage actress.

Aina is energetic, jokes around a lot, and often has a hard time staying in-character. One of her hobbies is looking after race horses. She also loves singing karaoke; one of her favorite songs to sing is "only my railgun."
